response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $1,200,000 to you, at a price that is $50,000 less than its perceived value. We are confident that this offer will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you choose to accept, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
